name.length: name must be between 1 and 100 characters

username.length: username must be between 3 and 50 characters

email.isEmail: email must be a valid email address
email.length: email must be between 1 and 255 characters

password.length: password must be between 8 and 255 characters

location.length: location must be between 1 and 30 characters

phone.isMobilePhone: phone must be a valid mobile phone number
phone.length: phone must be between 1 and 25 characters

verifiedAt.isDate: verifiedAt must be a valid date

birthDate.isDate: birthDate must be a valid date

gender.isEnum: gender must be a valid Gender enum value

status.isEnum: status must be a valid AccountStatus enum value

directMessaging.isEnum: directMessaging must be a valid DirectMessagingStatus enum value

profilePicture.isUrl: profilePicture must be a valid URL

header.isUrl: header must be a valid URL

role.isEnum: role must be a valid Role enum value

name.minLength: name must be at least 2 characters

email.isEmail: email must be a valid email address

emailOrUsername.isString: email or username must be a string

password.minLength: password must be at least 8 characters
password.length: password must be between 8 and 255 characters

oldPassword.isString: current password must be a string

confirmPassword.isString: password confirmation must be a string

verificationCode.isString: verification code must be a string

idToken.isString: ID token must be a string

setupToken.isString: setup token must be a string

reactivationToken.isString: reactivation token must be a string

birthDate.isDate: birth date must be a valid date

gender.isEnum: gender must be a valid value

username.length: username must be between 3 and 50 characters
username.isAlphanumeric: username must contain only letters and numbers

word.length: word must be between 3 and 100 characters

postId.isNumber: post ID must be a number

postId.isInt: post ID must be an integer
postId.isPositive: post ID must be a positive number

deleteFileIds.isArray: delete file IDs must be an array
deleteFileIds.isInt: delete file IDs must contain only integers
deleteFileIds.arrayMaxSize: you can delete a maximum of 4 files

q.isString: search query must be a string
q.minLength: search query must not be empty
q.maxLength: search query must not exceed 353 characters

f.isEnum: filter must be one of: user, live
